name: Portaal Mechelen (Opendata ArcGIS)
description: Open data portal for the city of Mechelen, providing access to GIS and geospatial datasets.
owner_subregion_name: Vlaams-Brabant, Antwerpen (Antwerp, in practice part of Flanders region; note: Mechelen is in Antwerp province, but the ArcGIS portal is specifically for city of Mechelen, which is a local government entity)
